about_the_game: Gonne wrong is all about awesome story and stunning visuals. Its a zombie based story-mode game. This game has wide range of zombies with different abilities which progresses along the story. You will have to find weapons and other needed things in the environment and fight zombies. The game features 9 different locations which are connected by story . Smooth mechanism of  Melee weapons and very realistic gunplay will give you your best experience with the gameplay. The game has 5 main NPC characters which will help you throughout the story.

content_descriptors.notes: Gonne wrong is zombie shooter game so it has constant fight against zombies so there will be constant blood splatter effects and little bit gore and Bad language.

detailed_description: Gonne wrong is all about awesome story and stunning visuals. Its a zombie based story-mode game. This game has wide range of zombies with different abilities which progresses along the story. You will have to find weapons and other needed things in the environment and fight zombies. The game features 9 different locations which are connected by story . Smooth mechanism of  Melee weapons and very realistic gunplay will give you your best experience with the gameplay. The game has 5 main NPC characters which will help you throughout the story.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Core i3 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Use Headphones for better sound experience.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Core i5 2.8GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Use Headphones for better sound experience.
